@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package eu.fbk.knowledgestore.filestore

FileStore server-side component API (ks-server).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileStore
    A storage for resource files, supporting CRUD operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ForwardingFileStore
    A FileStore that forwards all its method calls to another FileStore.
    GzippedFileStore
    A FileStore decorator that GZIPs all the compressible files written to it.
    HadoopFileStore
    A FileStore implementation based on the Hadoop API.
    LoggingFileStore
    A FileStore wrapper that log calls to the operations of a wrapped FileStore and their execution times.
    SynchronizedFileStore
    A FileStore wrapper that synchronizes and enforces a proper access to an another FileStore.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FileExistsException
    Signals an attempt at creating a file that already exists.
    FileMissingException
    Signals an attempt at accessing a non existing file.

Package eu.fbk.knowledgestore.filestore Description

FileStore server-side component API (ks-server).

This package defines the API of the FileStore internal server-side component, whose task is to provide a persistent storage for resource representations, acting in a way similar to a file system. More in details, the package provides:

  • the FileStore API (FileStore);
  • a base implementation (HadoopFileStore) that relies on the Hadoop API to abstract the access to the underlying file system, allowing to transparently use both the local file system and a distributed file systems such as HDFS;
  • an abstract class (ForwardingFileStore) for implementing the decorator pattern;
  • two concrete decorator classes that augment a FileStore with logging capabilities ( LoggingFileStore and transparent GZip compression ( GzippedFileStore).

Custom implementations of the FileStore component may be provided by the user to customize the way the KnowledgeStore stores resource files.
